post.body: talking to @shirleyearley about #ic09, suggests how do we globalise to europe, us, africa, asia etc?
i have some at home, give me a shout if you still need one later - if ur at huddle today i'll see you later!
awesome thanks! You will also get sneaky peak of new Huddle Desktop :-)
is it ok if i come see u guys this pm? Got work to hand in at 2 will b there asap, got present!
no. @bennuk true! @RobAshton - always lowering the tone
did you get the demo? You like?
@huddlesuz my Adobe Air books have just arrived - awesome! Thanks for the voucher!
nahhh, surely not?!
I was, until someone voted for me - sorry!
someone's beaten you to the biggest twit... but through no fault of his own
sorry that was aimed at @domgreen, oopsey I'm tired
thats why i have a digibox with dual tuners and a hard drive - when theres something good on i can record 2 channels simultaneously
the advent calendar, specifically the one we discussed on Tues - lecturers and their study tips each day - others cool tho
oh no, please don't that was only a joke ;)
but if there's any interesting ones, you can tell I have problems saying no with what im doing already - just let me know
haha no! If I have any more then I'll never get these ones finished! There are only so many hours in a day
well I only had about 10 to deal with today - yay!
sounds like a plan to me, in between my numerous other projects I'll see what I can do! (current project count: 8)
I dont really understand what you're looking for?
looks great, good job :)
cool, is @tiedyeina stillup to compiling it?
which 6 months? :D
bahahahaha that was so awesome :D
enjoy the party!
awesome, I'll check it out later - still don't feel up to much though :(
is huddle pizza eating some kind of collaborative project management pizza eating? Enjoy!
have a good party!
yeah! My dad has seasons 1-10 on DVD, I am watching one from 5 so have lots to catch up on!
is live! Go go go! http://twitorfit.com
just stop - it's Christmas now. Even I've stopped, and I never stop
thanks, had to go see my grandma. Time for a quick hour before going out later.
yeah it's the way to do it! How's your christmas day?
you know those toggles you wanted me to implement, is it ok if they go at the bottom? Can't squeeze them in at the top
heh, fair enough. I just turned it off as I annoyed too many people on facebook when I forgot they were connected.
abstain from work! Also stop replying to yourself :P
Al's cafe is truly legendary
awesome! Merry Christmas! Hope your bread goes down well again :)
IT WORKS! It's alive! Huddle Desktop securely remembers your credentials should you wish it to! Yes!!
Thats it, enough revision for now. Going to get chocolate before last lecture, to celebrate lectures being cancelled on Wednesday
Getting seriously bored of revision but it has to be done unfortunately. Can look forward to Huddle Desktop later as a result, though
Should be revising but got distracted by Twitter. Revising now would allow Huddle Desktop action later - think thats the way forward
Just made "Remember Me" button for Huddle Desktop. Doesn't have any backend implementation, but the checkbox is there!
Wondering how complicated I can make the Huddle Desktop start up without getting over the top...
Hardest part of bug hunting for other people: persuading them there actually is a bug...
Morning everyone, today has suddenly turned hectic, apologies if I don't get to whatever I said I'd do for you, I will do my best!
Immensely proud of what I've achieved with Huddle Desktop the past 3 days. Doesn't look like much but boy does it work better.
Haha found the annoying bug! Thoroughly recommend using humorous debug messages if you have one like that, makes it much more fun!
This is my 1000th tweet, so I'd like to take these 140 characters to say thanks to you guys - you're all amazing to follow, this place rules
Emily Loizeau - Je Suis Jalouse... if you understand french (or find the vid on youtube) is a very clever song. Also in 5/4 time - unusual
Huddle's new beta site is live - brand new Dashboard, now with widgets! Check it out and retweet! http://tinyurl.com/newhuddle
Just got back from ceremony, lasted 25% of time I expected it to and free beer afterwards. Cold fingers and wearing suit prevent WIN, though
Studying Huddle API, still can't find MIME types where I want them
Yes, list view is finally working and persists across sessions! WIN
Just did "Mark As Read" on 400 Google Reader items - saves me half an hour
Pretty awesome drinktank last night, congrats to award winners! Time for revision i think
Its pizza time at huddle hq!
Didnt manage to complete list view or get auto updates to work, groundwork is there though
Working on automatic updater for Air app - yummy!
Heading out tonight with loads of mates to celebrate end of term, if you wanna join in then just drop by!
Http://is.gd/bkrk great article on vista, windows 7, social media and of course twitter by @bennuk
Having lunch and contemplating the packing up i have to do today
Memo to self: when ipod says "cant send due to invalid email address" it actually means "i forgot your smtp auth details, enter them again"
Using iPod for somewhat trivial things, battery's going down! Ps @Bandrew dont cover the whole office!
One more hour to go, one last test... Please let it be reasonable!
Just finished Asimov's complete robot series - brilliant books and stories all of them!
Thanks guys, twitterfon seems great to me!
Ok, best twitter app for iPhone / iPod touch? Twitterific's ads are getting on my nerves.
Wondering what's the point in Facebook? All the good features are in Twitter.
Keep remembering stuff I'm supposed to have done but havent... Argh
Putting 600 music tracks on my new iPod = pain
My Right Hand is on Reuters! Also huddle and drinktank - http://tinyurl.com/5pjwty
On my new iPod, waiting for lecture, waiting to be proved wrong that it's gonna be tedious...
... aaand the iTunes store has fallen over. FAIL
Just got home, thanks to @stut for a well looked after iPod and @huddlesuz for the lead! Now to type in WEP password...
Now heading off to see @stut and buy his ipod! Will be there in 45 mins or so
Watching @emmaguy's favourite stargate
Got a billion and one emails from play and amazon saying orders dispached, postman's gonna love me over next few days!
Oh Microsoft, what has thee done now? Fearful of what will happen tomorrow - what could go wrong next?! Ps thanks for starbucks voucher MS
Just won a Â£10 starbucks voucher from ImagineCup.com - win! If you wanna be part of it, http://tinyurl.com/imaginecup09
Just seen an awesome Christmas preview on BBC1, looks like their editors had a field day! Fed up of house programs, gonna watch Stargate.
Feeling a lot worse today - time for a trip to the doctors, apparently
In terms of work today has been pretty much a complete failure. Not so much in Christmas shopping terms but that wasn't the aim of today.
Apparently Google Friend Connect now supports logging in with your Twitter account - this is looking very win
TwitOrFit's girls bottom 10 is filled with guys who can't fill in registration forms properly
TwitOrFit has absolutely exploded! What happened there!
Being very much distracted by Play.com and Twitter. Now going to get on with work - honest
So far 2 men have signed up for TwitOrFit and forgot to chose "Girl" as opposed to "Guy" from the dropdown - oops
Absolute fail at starting work at 9.30 - meh! Been shopping and now time for breakfast, then work honest!
Given my CPU a Christmas present - extracting and transcoding 4 gig of music
Merry christmas everyone! Best wishes, hope everyone has fun. The oven is on already!
And I heard him call, as he flew out of sight; Merry Christmas to all, and to all, a good night. Happy Christmas folks.
In a weird turn if events, I'm now going down to put dad's presents by fireplace - he gets too tempted to feel if they're under tree
Figured it out! Yes! A sinusoidal *input*, of course!
Finally got all the buttons doing what they should. Took long enough.
Dammit, Air 1.5 not setting drag images correctly, WHYYY. E-mailed AIR legend I know for a few pointers
Just realised my new website needs a complete client-side restructure. Also my head just exploded.
That's it, I've had it with FB connect's over complicatedness and Google Friend Connect's over simplification and im gonna write it myself!
That's not strictly true - Google Friend Connect is easier to implement, Facebook Connect is easier to get to do what I want it to.
Toss up between Google Friend Connect and Facebook Connect... FB seems easier to implement, but I might just use Twitter IDs
Mmm, Javascript before breakfast.
